remarks: Reconstruction from the dual space span of a singleton.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Feb-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lcfrvalsn.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcfrvalsn.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcfrvalsn.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcfrvalsn.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
lcfrvalsn.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
lcfrvalsn.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` U ) $.
lcfrvalsn.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` D ) $.
lcfrvalsn.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcfrvalsn.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
lcfrvalsn.q $e |- Q = U_ f e. R ( ._|_ ` ( L ` f ) ) $.
lcfrvalsn.r $e |- R = ( N ` { G } ) $.
lcfrvalsnN $p |- ( ph -> Q = ( ._|_ ` ( L ` G ) ) ) $.
$d ._|_ f $.
$d G f $.
$d L f $.
$d R f $.
$d f ph $.
